description-GoBuid-1: Developed an onboarding system that increased user retention by 20%, effectively improving product adoption and user engagement
description-GoBuid-2: Addressed code maintenance challenges by refactoring frontend architecture, decomposing monolithic components into modular components and custom hooks, improving code readability and maintenance efficiency by 80%
description-GoBuid-3: Independently designed and implemented Playwright automated testing architecture, focusing on core functionality flow testing, eliminating manual testing dependencies and reducing release risks
description-inteware-1: Resolved performance issues with bulk model data uploads by independently developing batch upload management functionality, self-designed Queue mechanism to optimize concurrency control, supporting 500+ data records per batch and reducing user data management time by 70%
description-inteware-2: Addressed 3D model rendering performance bottlenecks by implementing Web Workers for background computation, reducing model loading time by 90% for users
description-inteware-3: Introduced Zustand to simplify state management logic, enhancing development efficiency and maintainability
description-inteware-4: Upgraded the project from React 17 to React 18
description-intern-1: Optimized the ordering app, added additional options (such as adding chili) and history order query functions, reducing the ordering process time by 50%
description-intern-2: Optimized the shopping website's container, tab, and header switching functions, achieving dynamic content display height adjustment, reducing the complexity of calculating displayed content, and reducing the user loading page time by 20%
description-intern-3: Used the Cypress automated testing framework to test the processes of adding items to the cart and checking out, reducing the testing time by 80%
degree-master: Master of Department of Computer Science and Information Engineering
school-master: National Taichung University of Science and Technology
award-1-name: Third Place in Northern Taiwan GDSC Hackathon
